text: Gloria Gaither (born March 4, 1942) is a Christian songwriter, editor, educator and screenwriter. She is the wife of Bill Gaither. They have written more than 700 songs. She performed, traveled and recorded with the Bill Gaither Trio from 1965 through 1991. She became the narrator for the Gaither Homecoming series of television broadcasts in 1991. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American songwriters Category:American screenwriters Category:Educators from Michigan Category:American television presenters Category:People from Battle Creek, Michigan Category:Writers from Michigan
title: Gloria Gaither
